footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Fischl | Update Date: 08/25/2022 | Editor: Luno#1337

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Skyward Harp, Thundering Pulse, Polar Star, Aqua Simulacra__ 
Fischl’s 5 star weapon options are generally within similar margins to one another. Skyward Harp, Thundering Pulse, and Aqua Simulacra provide consistent damage while Polar Star has a conditional passives that, when maintained, pulls ahead over her other weapon options. 
** **

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value:
__The Stringless, Alley Hunter__ 
Gacha 4-star weapons that are extremely potent options on Fischl, which at high refinements can perform competitively to her 5-star weapon options.
At equal refinements, Alley Hunter usually performs (marginally) better than The Stringless as the high Base Attack and ATK% is much more appreciated in Fischl’s team compositions compared to the EM stat that The Stringless provides. 

__Elegy of the End__ 
Although Elegy of the End is one of her weakest options with regards to her personal damage, the weapon passive’s party buff can outweigh the loss in personal damage in certain team compositions. ( most common when Fischl is run in the flex slot of vape teams ) 

__Prototype Crescent__ 
F2P option which performs rather well at high refinements. However, this assumes players will go out of their way to proc the weapon’s passive and snapshot it unto Oz. Should players not want to deal with a high-maintenance weapon, it is best to look for other weapon options instead. 
** **

fields.name: Best Artifact Set:
fields.value: 2-piece combinations of +18% ATK work fine on Fischl. However, in numerous cases, the quality of the substats takes a much higher priority compared to forcing the set bonus’.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% |<goblet>  Electro DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT Rate / CRIT DMG

fields.name: Substats Priority
fields.value: Energy Recharge ( see notes ) |CRIT Rate|CRIT DMG|ATK%

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Nightrider
**2)** Elemental Burst: Midnight Phantasmagoria

Normal attacks are irrelevant to upgrade in this playstyle.

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Fischl’s ER requirements varies wildly depending on the scenario she is used in. Thus, it is best to check with the Energy Recharge Calculator to find out her ER requirements in player’s specific team compositions.

**Niche Artifact sets:**
__4 Thundersoother__
Strong option when playing Fischl in monoelectro/ most electrocharge compositions where electro aura is maintained. However, the damage gained is rarely worthwhile. Thus, players should not farm specifically for the 4-set bonus on Fischl when 2-piece options perform competitively.

__4 TotM__ 
An artifact set that, although can be better for certain team compositions owing to the high buff-uptime she provides, is not generally worth recommending as her personal damage suffers significantly when running this 4-set bonus. Unless hyperinvesting into one’s Fischl, it is best to drop farming for this artifact set entirely.
